recent_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'onbill_doc' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.carrier, doc.onbill_doc_type, doc.number_assigned], doc.number_assigned); }

number_lookup.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'onbill_doc' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.carrier, doc.onbill_doc_type, doc.month_assigned, doc.account_id], doc.number_assigned); }
